info.title: Digitraffic Road API
info.description:
[OpenAPI document](/swagger/openapi.json) 

Digitraffic is a service operated by the [Fintraffic](https://www.fintraffic.fi) offering real time traffic information. Currently the service covers *road, marine and rail* traffic. More information can be found at the [Digitraffic website](https://www.digitraffic.fi/) 

The service has a public Google-group [road.digitraffic.fi](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/roaddigitrafficfi) for communication between developers, service administrators and Fintraffic. The discussion in the forum is mostly in Finnish, but you're welcome to communicate in English too. 

### General notes of the API
* Many Digitraffic APIs use GeoJSON as data format. Definition of the GeoJSON format can be found at https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946.
* For dates and times [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format is used with "Zulu" zero offset from UTC unless otherwise specified (i.e., "yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss[.mmm]Z"). E.g. 2019-11-01T06:30:00Z.

license.name: Digitraffic is an open data service. All content from the service and the service documentation is licenced under the Creative Commons 4.0 BY license.

get.summary: TMS raw history data

parameters.name: tmsNumber
parameters.description: TMS Station tmsNumber (Not station id!)

parameters.name: yearShort
parameters.description: Year in short format, last two digits of the year

parameters.name: dayNumber
parameters.description: Day of the year (i.e. ordinal date, value between 1-366, taking into account leap years). e.g. 1.1. = 1

200.description: Successful retrieval of TMS raw history data

get.summary: Road maintenance tracking tasks

200.description: Successful retrieval of maintenance tracking tasks

get.summary: Road maintenance tracking routes

parameters.name: endFrom
parameters.description: Return routes which have completed onwards from the given time (inclusive). Default is 24h in past and maximum interval between from and to is 24h.

parameters.name: endBefore
parameters.description: Return routes which have completed before the given end time (exclusive). Default is now and maximum interval between from and to is 24h.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: Return routes which have been created after the given time (exclusive). Maximum interval between createdFrom and createdTo is 24h.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Return routes which have been created before the given time (exclusive). Maximum interval between createdFrom and createdTo is 24h.

parameters.name: xMin
parameters.description:
Minimum x coordinate (longitude) Coordinates are in WGS84 format in decimal degrees. Values between 19.0 and 32.0.
xMin coordinate will be rounded to nearest integer that is less than or equal to given value

parameters.name: yMin
parameters.description:
Minimum y coordinate (latitude). Coordinates are in WGS84 format in decimal degrees. Values between 59.0 and 72.0.
yMin coordinate will be rounded to nearest half that is less than or equal to given value

parameters.name: xMax
parameters.description:
Maximum x coordinate (longitude). Coordinates are in WGS84 format in decimal degrees. Values between 19.0 and 32.0.
xMax coordinate will be rounded to nearest integer greater than or equal to given value

parameters.name: yMax
parameters.description:
Maximum y coordinate (latitude). Coordinates are in WGS84 format in decimal degrees. Values between 59.0 and 72.0.
yMax coordinate will be rounded to nearest half that is greater than or equal to given value

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: Task ids to include. Any tracking containing one of the selected tasks will be returned.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Data domains. If domain is not given default value of "state-roads" will be used.

200.description: Successful retrieval of maintenance tracking routes

get.summary: Road maintenance tracking route with tracking id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Tracking id

200.description: Successful retrieval of maintenance tracking routes

get.summary: Road maintenance tracking routes latest points

parameters.name: endFrom
parameters.description: Return routes which have completed onwards from the given time (inclusive). Default is -1h from now and maximum -24h.

parameters.name: xMin
parameters.description:
Minimum x coordinate (longitude) Coordinates are in WGS84 format in decimal degrees. Values between 19.0 and 32.0.
xMin coordinate will be rounded to nearest integer that is less than or equal to given value

parameters.name: yMin
parameters.description:
Minimum y coordinate (latitude). Coordinates are in WGS84 format in decimal degrees. Values between 59.0 and 72.0.
yMin coordinate will be rounded to nearest half that is less than or equal to given value

parameters.name: xMax
parameters.description:
Maximum x coordinate (longitude). Coordinates are in WGS84 format in decimal degrees. Values between 19.0 and 32.0.
xMax coordinate will be rounded to nearest integer greater than or equal to given value

parameters.name: yMax
parameters.description:
Maximum y coordinate (latitude). Coordinates are in WGS84 format in decimal degrees. Values between 59.0 and 72.0.
yMax coordinate will be rounded to nearest half that is greater than or equal to given value

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: Task ids to include. Any route containing one of the selected tasks will be returned.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Data domains. If domain is not given default value of "state-roads" will be used.

200.description: Successful retrieval of maintenance tracking latest routes

200.description: Successful retrieval of maintenance tracking domains

get.summary: Infos about apis data update times
get.description:
This API returns info about data update intervals, when data is last updated and how often should API to be called by client. 
For `dataUpdateInterval` field the `P0S` value has special meaning that data is updated nearly in real time. 
`null` value indicates static data and it is only updated when needed.

200.description: Successful retrieval of info data

items.description: Direction
Travel mode

granularity.description: Time interval between two consecutive data

directional.description: Indicator telling if directions are distinguished

items.description: Domain

coordinates.description: An array of coordinates. Coordinates are in WGS84 format in decimal degrees: [LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, {ALTITUDE}]. Altitude is optional and measured in meters.

items.description: An array of coordinates. Coordinates are in WGS84 format in decimal degrees: [LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, {ALTITUDE}]. Altitude is optional and measured in meters.

WeathercamPresetSimpleV1.description: Weathercam preset object with basic information

WeathercamStationFeatureCollectionSimple.description: Weathercam GeoJSON FeatureCollection object with basic information

WeathercamStationFeatureSimpleV1.description: Weathercam station GeoJSON Feature object with basic information

WeathercamStationPropertiesSimpleV1.description: Weathercam station properties object with basic information

distanceFromRoadSectionStart.description: Distance from start of the road portion [m]

carriageway.description:
Carriageway
ONE_CARRIAGEWAY: 0 = One carriageway road section
DUAL_CARRIAGEWAY_RIGHT_IN_INCREASING_DIRECTION: 1 = Dual carriageway's right carriageway on increasing direction
DUAL_CARRIAGEWAY_LEFT_IN_INCREASING_DIRECTION: 2 = Dual carriageway's left carriageway on increasing direction (upstream)

side.description:
Road address side information
* UNKNOWN: 0 = Unknown,
* RIGHT 1 = On the right side of the carriageway in the increasing direction,
* LEFT: 2 = On the left side of the carriageway in the increasing direction,
* BETWEEN: 3 = Between the carriageways,
* END: 7 = At the end of the road,
* MIDDLE: 8 = In the middle of the carriageway / on the carriageway,
* CROSS: 9 = Across the road

directionCode.description:
Preset direction:
0 = Unknown direction.
1 = According to the road register address increasing direction. I.e. on the road 4 to Lahti, if we are in Korso.
2 = According to the road register address decreasing direction. I.e. on the road 4 to Helsinki, if we are in Korso.
3 = Increasing direction of the crossing road.
4 = Decreasing direction of the crossing road.
5-99 = Special directions

RoadStationSensorDirection.description:
Road station sensor direction
UNKNOWN: 0 = Unknown direction.
INCREASING_DIRECTION: 1 = According to the road register address increasing direction. I.e. on the road 4 to Rovaniemi.
DECREASING_DIRECTION: 2 = According to the road register address decreasing direction. I.e. on the road 4 to Helsinki.

presentationNames.description: Map of presentation names [fi, sv, en]

additionalProperties.description: Map of sensor descriptions [fi, sv, en]

descriptions.description: Map of sensor descriptions [fi, sv, en]

ForecastSectionFeatureCollectionV1.description: GeoJSON feature collection of forecast sections

id.description:
Forecast section identifier ie. 00004_342_01435_0_274.569: 
1. Road number 5 characters ie. 00004, 
2. Road section 3 characters ie. 342, 
3. Start distance 5 characters ie. 000, 
4. Carriageway 1 character, 
5. Measure value of link start point. Varying number of characters ie. 274.569, 
Refers to Digiroad content at https://aineistot.vayla.fi/digiroad/

ForecastSectionFeatureV1.description: GeoJSON feature object of forecast section

id.description:
Forecast section identifier ie. 00004_342_01435_0_274.569: 
1. Road number 5 characters ie. 00004, 
2. Road section 3 characters ie. 342, 
3. Start distance 5 characters ie. 000, 
4. Carriageway 1 character, 
5. Measure value of link start point. Varying number of characters ie. 274.569, 
Refers to Digiroad content at https://aineistot.vayla.fi/digiroad/

roadSegments.description: Forecast section road segments. Refers to https://aineistot.vayla.fi/digiroad/

linkIds.description: Forecast section link indices. Refers to https://aineistot.vayla.fi/digiroad/

items.description: Forecast section link indices. Refers to https://aineistot.vayla.fi/digiroad/

coordinates.description: An array of LinearRing coordinates. Coordinates are in WGS84 format in decimal degrees: [LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, {ALTITUDE}]. Altitude is optional and measured in meters.

items.description: An array of LinearRing coordinates. Coordinates are in WGS84 format in decimal degrees: [LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, {ALTITUDE}]. Altitude is optional and measured in meters.
An array of LinearRing coordinates. Coordinates are in WGS84 format in decimal degrees: [LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, {ALTITUDE}]. Altitude is optional and measured in meters.
An array of LinearRing coordinates. Coordinates are in WGS84 format in decimal degrees: [LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, {ALTITUDE}]. Altitude is optional and measured in meters.

RoadSegmentDtoV1.description: Forecast section road segments. Refers to https://aineistot.vayla.fi/digiroad/

precipitationCondition.description:
Precipitation condition:
0 = no data available,
1 = rain intensity lt 0.2 mm/h,
2 = rain intensity ge 0.2 mm/h,
3 = rain intensity ge 2.5 mm/h,
4 = rain intensity ge 7.6 mm/h,
5 = snowing intensity ge 0.2 cm/h,
6 = snowing intensity ge 1 cm/h,
7 = snowing intensity ge 3 cm/h
(lt = lower than, ge = greater or equal)

freezingRainCondition.description: Tells if there is freezing rain: true/false

winterSlipperiness.description: Tells if it is slippery: true/false

frictionCondition.description: The amount of friction on the road

ForecastConditionReasonDtoV1.description: Forecast that is used is Vaisala’s weather forecast which is initialised from the weather model that performs best for Finland for a period under study. Majority of the times the initialisation is done from ECMWF model data. Then Vaisala meteorologists also manually edit the data to fix certain known errors in the model.

id.description:
VERSION 1: Forecast section identifier 15 characters ie. 00004_112_000_0:
1. Road number 5 characters ie. 00004,
2. Road section 3 characters ie. 112,
3. Road section version 3 characters ie. 000,
4. Reserved for future needs 1 characters default 0

VERSION 2: Forecast section identifier ie. 00004_342_01435_0_274.569:
1. Road number 5 characters ie. 00004,
2. Road section 3 characters ie. 342,
3. Start distance 5 characters ie. 000,
4. Carriageway 1 character,
5. Measure value of link start point. Varying number of characters ie. 274.569,
Refers to Digiroad content at https://aineistot.vayla.fi/digiroad/

time.description: Observation or forecast time depending on type

type.description: Tells if object is an observation or a forecast. (OBSERVATION, FORECAST)

daylight.description: Tells if there is daylight: true/false

roadTemperature.description: Road temperature at given time. If not available value is not set

windDirection.description: Wind direction in degrees. 0 when there is no wind or the direction is variable. 90 degrees is arrow to the east (count clockwise)

weatherSymbol.description: Weather symbol code. See corresponding symbols at https://www.vaisala.com/en/vaisala-weather-symbols. Symbols are allowed to be used in user's applications but any further modification and redistribution is denied.

ForecastSectionFeatureCollectionSimpleV1.description: GeoJSON feature collection of simple forecast sections

id.description: Forecast section identifier 15 characters ie. 00004_112_000_0, see properties id description.

ForecastSectionFeatureSimpleV1.description: GeoJSON feature object of simple forecast section

id.description:
Forecast section identifier 15 characters ie. 00004_112_000_0: 
1. Road number 5 characters ie. 00004, 
2. Road section 3 characters ie. 112, 
3. Road section version 3 characters ie. 000, 
4. Reserved for future needs 1 characters default 0

VariableSignFeatureCollectionV1.description: GeoJSON Feature Collection of variable signs

VariableSignFeatureV1.description: GeoJSON Feature Object of variable sign

direction.description: Direction of variable sign, increasing or decreasing road address

carriageway.description:
Variable sign placement:
SINGLE = Single carriageway rod
RIGHT = First carriageway on the right in the direction of the road number
LEFT = Second carriageway on the left in the direction of the road number
BETWEEN = Between the carriageways

displayValue.description: Value that is displayed on the device

additionalInformation.description: Additional information displayed on the device

effectDate.description: Information is effect after this date

cause.description:
Cause for changing the sign:
Automaatti = Automatic
Käsiohjaus = By hand

textRows.description: Text rows if sign contains a screen

locationCode.description: AlertC location code. Number of the location point in AlertC location table

distance.description: Distance of the road point from the AlertC location point

AreaLocationV1.description: Location consisting of one or more areas

locationCode.description: Location code of the area, number of the road point in AlertC location table

minimum.description: Estimated minimum duration using ISO-8601 duration

maximum.description: Estimated maximum duration using ISO-8601 duration

name.description: Feature name, e.g.black ice on road, or speed limit

quantity.description: Feature quantity, e.g. 30 in {speed limit, 30, km/h}

unit.description: Unit of the feature quantity, e.g. km/h in {speed limit, 30, km/h}

description.description: Further details of the feature, e.g. description of a detour
description.example: The road is narrow and winding

FeatureV1.description: Characteristics and qualities of the situation

streetName.description: Name of the street if leg is on the street network

ItineraryLegV1.description: ItineraryLeg is one leg of the route

startArea.description: Description of the place on the road, where this leg starts.

endArea.description: Description of the place on the road, where this leg ends.

ItineraryRoadLegV1.description: ItineraryRoadLeg is route leg that is on the road network.

startTime.description: The time when the transport may start this segment.

endTime.description: Time by which the transport has finished this segment.

LastActiveItinerarySegmentV1.description: The itinerary segment of this special transport that is or was last active.

countryCode.description: AlertC country code defined by RDS (IEC 62106)

locationTableNumber.description: AlertC location table number. Country code + location table number fully identifies the table.

LocationV1.description: AlertC location of a traffic situation announcement

RestrictionV1.description: A single phase in a larger road work

directionDescription.description: Human readable description of the affected direction

RoadAddressLocationV1.description: Location consisting of a single road point or a road segment between two road points

country.description: Usually Finland, but may be something else eq. Sweden, Norway, Russia.

roadName.description: Name of the road where the accident happened.

workingHours.description: WorkingHours of an traffic situation announcement

workTypes.description: The types of work that are carried out

restrictionsLiftable.description: Restrictions can be lifted for abnormal transports

severity.description: Severity of the disruption to traffic. How severely this road work phase disrupts traffic. LOW - no disruption, HIGH - disruption, HIGHEST - significant disruption

slowTrafficTimes.description: Time periods when the road work is expected to cause slow moving traffic.

queuingTrafficTimes.description: Time periods when the road work is expected to cause queuing of the traffic.

RoadWorkPhaseV1.description: A single phase in a larger road work

endTime.description: End time of the situation. If the end time has been passed, the situation can be assumed to be over. If end time is not given, there will be follow-up announcement about the situation.

TrafficAnnouncementFeatureCollectionV1.description: GeoJSON Feature Collection of Traffic Announcements

announcements.description: Contains announcement's different language versions available.

language.description: Language of the announcement, always fi. A subset of ISO 639-1 in upper case.

roadWorkPhases.description: Contains the phases of this road maintenance work

earlyClosing.description: Road work was closed before the planned time. 'CLOSED' means the road work closed after its start time, possibly skipping some phases. 'CANCELED' means the road work was canceled before its start time. Note: This field is null if the road work closes normally.

distance.description: Distance from the beginning of the road section.

TrafficMessageRoadAddressV1.description: Location in road address (road number + number of the road section + distance from the beginning of the road section

roadJunction.description: Roadnumber for roads. Junctionno: the numbering of exits has only just begun on the very limited Finnish motorway network. The exit numbers will be included. NOTE: the roads, segments and points are not sorted in ascending order

roadName.description: Roadname if exists, L5.0 always have road name

firstName.description: For roads and segments this is the name of the starting point. For all other objects (linear (streets), area and point) this is the name of the object

secondName.description: For roads and segments this is the name of the ending point. For point locations the number of the intersecting road

areaRef.description: Code of the upper order administrative area

linearRef.description: For segments and point locations. Describes the code of the segment which these objects belong to. If there are no segments on the road the location code of the road is given instead

negOffset.description: For segments and point locations. Segments: describes the code of previous segment on that road. For the first segment on the road this code is 0. Points: describes the code of previous point on that road. For the starting point this code is 0

posOffset.description: For segments and point locations. Segments: describes the code of next segment on that road. For the last segment on the road this code is 0. Points: describes the code of next point on that road. For the last point this code is 0

urban.description: Indicates whether a point is within the city limits (1) or not (0). NOTE: Not actively entered yet

coordinatesETRS89.description: Point coordinates (LONGITUDE, LATITUDE). Coordinates are in ETRS89 / ETRS-TM35FIN format.

items.description: Point coordinates (LONGITUDE, LATITUDE). Coordinates are in ETRS89 / ETRS-TM35FIN format.

negDirection.description: For all L5.0 and for some roads. Text to be used when the incident has an effect only on vehicles driving in the negative direction of the road. ( e.g. Ring 1 westbound)

posDirection.description: For all L5.0 and for some roads. Text to be used when the incident has an effect only on vehicles driving in the positive direction of the road. ( e.g. Ring 1 eastbound)

geocode.description: Point location according to Finnish Transport Agency’s official addressing where Locations on road network are addressed as: Road number;Road part number;Carriageway; Distance from the beginning of the road part

orderOfPoint.description: The order of point within line or segment feature

LocationTypesDtoV1.description: TMS/Alert-C Location types and location subtypes

RegionGeometryFeatureCollectionV1.description: GeoJSON Feature Collection of Region Geometries

locationCode.description: The Alert-C code of the region

effectiveDate.description: The moment, when the data comes into effect

TmsStationFeatureCollectionSimpleV1.description: GeoJSON feature collection of TMS stations

TmsStationFeatureSimpleV1.description: Tms station GeoJSON Feature object with basic information

tmsNumber.description: TMS station number (naturalId) for legacy support

TmsStationPropertiesSimpleV1.description: Tms station properties object with basic information

TmsStationFeatureDetailedV1.description: Tms station GeoJSON feature object with detailed information

additionalProperties.example: {"fi":"Tie 7 Porvoo, Harabacka","sv":"Väg 7 Borgå, Harabacka","en":"Road 7 Porvoo, Harabacka"}

direction1Municipality.description: Direction 1 municipality (1 = According to the road register address increasing direction. I.e. on the road 4 to Lahti, if we are in Korso.)

direction2Municipality.description: Direction 2 municipality (2 = According to the road register address decreasing direction. I.e. on the road 4 to Helsinki, if we are in Korso.)

items.description: Tms Station Sensors ids

TmsStationPropertiesDetailedV1.description: Tms station properties object with basic information

validFrom.description: Validity start in format mm-dd ie. value 01-31 is 31th of January

validTo.description: Validity end in format mm-dd ie. value 01-31 is 31th of January

dataUpdatedTime.description: Time when data was last updated
Time when data was last updated

sensorValues.description: Measured sensor values of the station

TmsStationDataDtoV1.description: TMS station data with sensor values

dataUpdatedTime.description: Time when data was last updated

TmsStationsSensorConstantsDataDtoV1.description: Latest sensor constant values of TMS stations

dataUpdatedTime.description: Time when data was last updated

TmsStationsDataDtoV1.description: Latest measurement data from TMS stations

additionalProperties.description: Map of presentation names [fi, sv, en]

presentationNames.description: Map of presentation names [fi, sv, en]

additionalProperties.description: Map of sensor descriptions [fi, sv, en]

descriptions.description: Map of sensor descriptions [fi, sv, en]

yearShort.description: Year in short format, last two digits of the year

dayNumber.description: Day of the year (i.e. ordinal date, taking into account leap years). e.g. 1.1. = 1

length.description: Length of the vehicle in meters

direction.description: Measurement direction </br>1 = According to the road register address increasing direction. I.e. on the road 4 to Rovaniemi.</br>2 = According to the road register address decreasing direction. I.e. on the road 4 to Helsinki.

vehicleClass.description: Vehicle class</br>1 HA-PA (car or delivery van)</br>2 KAIP (truck, no trailer)</br>3 Buses</br>4 KAPP (semi-trailer truck)</br>5 KATP (truck with trailer)</br>6 HA + PK (car or delivery van with trailer)</br>7 HA + AV (car or delivery van with trailer or camper)

MaintenanceTrackingFeatureCollectionV1.description: GeoJSON Feature Collection of maintenance trackings

MaintenanceTrackingFeatureV1.description: GeoJSON Feature Object of maintenance tracking.

previousId.description: Id for the previous tracking if known

items.description: Tasks done during maintenance work

startTime.description: Start time of maintenance work tasks

endTime.description: End time of maintenance work tasks

source.description: Source and owner of the data

MaintenanceTrackingLatestFeatureCollecti.description: GeoJSON Feature Collection of maintenance trackings latest values

MaintenanceTrackingLatestFeatureV1.description: GeoJSON Feature Object of latest maintenance tracking.

items.description: Tasks done during maintenance work

source.description: Source and owner of the data

name.description: Name of the maintenance tracking domain

source.description: Source and owner of the data

subtype.description: More specific info about API. Ie. domain info.

dataCheckedTime.description:
Latest check for data updates.
`null` value indicates data being pushed to our platform or static data that is only updated when needed.

dataUpdateInterval.description:
Data update interval in ISO-8601 duration format `PnDTnHnMn.nS`.
`P0S` means that data is updated in nearly real time.
`null` means that data is static and updated only when needed.

recommendedFetchInterval.description: Recommended fetch interval for clients in ISO-8601 duration format `PnDTnHnMn.nS`

UpdateInfoDtoV1.description: Info about API data updates (update intervals, last updated times)

UpdateInfosDtoV1.description: Info about API data updates (update intervals, last updated times)

tags.name: Weather V1
tags.description: Road weather stations and road weather forecasts
